Dear Lokesh, 

I hope the new year is treating you well. 

My name is Pranjay Kumar, and I am a sophomore studying finance and accounting at NYU Stern. I would like to know your availability for a quick chat in the coming weeks to hear about your experience at Orion Business Innovation, particularly the path that led you to project management from M&A advisory. 

As someone unsure of the best way to start a career in project management, advice from someone with such a diverse background would be invaluable. I'd love to learn more about how you successfully manage a team across five continents and your experience working with EY on digital tax transformations. 

I am attaching my resume for you to look over, and I would gladly work around your schedule to find a time that works for you. Thank you for considering my request, and I am excited to hear from you. 

Sincerely, 
Pranjay Kumar

Dear Steven, 

I hope you're doing well. 

My name is Pranjay Kumar, and I am a junior at NYU Stern studying finance and accounting. I'm inquiring if you are available for a quick call in the coming weeks to discuss your experience at the intersection of strategy consulting and change management. 

As someone unsure of the best way to start a career in strategy consulting, advice from someone with so much experience would be amazing. I'd love to learn more about your experience at KPMG and why you chose management consulting after studying finance and music. 

Your insights would be especially beneficial as someone interested in the intersection of tech and consulting on exploring how firms best adapt to a rapidly changing environmenthearing about your journey from conducting research at Stern to working at KPMG. 

I have attached my resume for you to look over, and I would gladly work around your schedule to find a time that fits. I look forward to connecting and hope you have a great rest of your week! 

Sincerely, 
Pranjay Kumar

Would you be free for a call or coffee in the coming weeks to discuss your experience at KPMG helping firms strategize, optimize, and reimagine their operating models?

I have attached my resume for you to look over, and I look forward to hearing from you soon. 

Sincerely, 
Pranjay Kumar
